alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Nottoway (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lunenburg and Nottoway Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Spainville to near Keysville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blackstone, Crewe, Victoria, Kenbridge, Nottoway, Lunenburg, Kells Corner, Rehoboth, Spainville, North Wellville, Irby, Arvins Store, Murdocks, Nutbush, The Falls, Plantersville, Wellville, Blevins Corner, Pleasant Grove and Dominy Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and south central Virginia.
